properties.title: Bivouac au Col de la Dent Blanche CAS
properties.abstract: monter son propre Réchaud et cartouche/assiettes, services etc. à disposition / couverture+oreiller à disposition
properties.description: Massively constructed, hexagonal building on the col between Dent Blanche and Grand Cornier. Starting point for high alpine ridge climbing to the two summits. Comfortable bivouac, without permanent cooking facilities, however. Demanding access trail from Ferpècle across Dent Blanche Glacier. Interesting, spectacular view of Weisshorn, Zinalrothorn, Ober Gabelhorn and Dent Blanche.
